entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:50 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -40.1°C
Wind: N 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
